statements: SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT issue_reported, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT feedback, timestamp FROM UserFeedback WHERE issue_reported LIKE '%bug%';
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT issue_reported FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY issue_reported ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT issue_reported FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, issue_reported, feedback, timestamp FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT * FROM user_issues WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT issue_description, reported_at FROM user_issues WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_description FROM feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, issue_description, reported_at FROM user_issues WHERE reported_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_issues;
SELECT user_id, issue_description FROM user_issues WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_description FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, issue_description, reported_at FROM user_issues UNION SELECT id, feedback_description, submitted_at FROM feedback ORDER BY reported_at DESC, submitted_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reported_issues;
SELECT issue_desc, reported_by_id FROM user_reported_issues WHERE reported_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_desc FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT concern_id, concern_desc FROM community_concerns WHERE reported_by_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_reported_issues WHERE issue_desc LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reported_issues ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_desc, reported_at FROM user_reported_issues WHERE reported_by_id = 1;
SELECT concern_desc, reported_by_id FROM community_concerns WHERE concern_status = 'open';
SELECT feedback_desc, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_reported_issues UNION SELECT * FROM community_concerns;
SELECT * FROM issues ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM issues WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY issue_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%problem%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM platform_functionality WHERE platform_feature = 'Search' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM issues ORDER BY issue_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT issue_description, timestamp FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as num_issues FROM issues GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_issues > 1;
SELECT platform_feature, user_feedback FROM platform_functionality WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT concern_description FROM community_concerns WHERE LENGTH(concern_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_reports;
SELECT report_id, user_id, issue_description FROM user_reports ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;
SELECT concern_id, concern_description, concern_status FROM platform_concerns WHERE concern_status='Open';
SELECT functionality_name, functionality_description FROM platform_functionality WHERE functionality_status='Active';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_reports ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, issue_description FROM user_reports WHERE user_id = 101 OR user_id = 102;
SELECT feedback_description AS feedback, feedback_timestamp AS time FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT concern_description, concern_resolution, concern_status FROM platform_concerns WHERE concern_status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
